title: I Love Farming - Novel Updates

description:
When Cui Qichao's ancient emperor blood awakened, he began to suppress the emperor's instincts in various worlds...by crazily farming.

Yandi Shennong's blood, quality farming guaranteed.

Cui Qichao: I love farming, farming makes me happy!
